Beach.name: Copacabana Beach
Beach.description: World-famous white sand beach buzzing with samba music and beach volleyball.
Beach.recommend: Visit during the morning to avoid crowds.

Festival.name: Rio Carnival
Festival.description: A week-long celebration with parades, costumes, and samba dancing through the streets.

Nature.name: Christ the Redeemer
Nature.description: An iconic 30-meter-tall statue overlooking the city from Mount Corcovado.
Nature.recommend: Go early or late to enjoy clear views.
